content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a case that lasted for 4 years the judge made a final ruling in favor of one party disregarding the requests of the other party the judgment determined the right to inhabit a property and identified the value of various properties and lands an expert prepared a divisional project dividing the properties into three lots and the judge approved it the judge dissolved the community and assigned specific properties to each party taking into account the right of habitation of one party the judge also addressed the issue of the assignment of rights based on a drawing lot but decided to deviate from it due to the specific circumstances of the case the judge ordered the assignment of properties according to a different allocation the costs of the expert and the legal proceedings were divided between the parties in the end the judge ruled that the right to inhabit the property belongs to ra including a dwelling a shed and a heating plant the judge also assigned specific portions of the property to the municipality of castelfrentano and another party named adp the costs of the trial will be divided between the parties involved the ruling was made on june 20 2021
